meanings.definition: Bring the different elements of (a complex activity or organization) into a relationship that will ensure efficiency or harmony.
meanings.sent1: She coordinates the team meetings to make sure everyone is on the same page.
meanings.sent2: The event planner coordinates all the details for the big conference.
meanings.sent3: The orchestra conductor coordinates the musicians to create beautiful music.
meanings.sent4: In a dance performance, each dancer coordinates their movements with precision.
meanings.sent5: The traffic lights are coordinated to keep traffic flowing smoothly.

meanings.definition: A set of values that show an exact position.
meanings.sent1: The map displays the coordinates of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: The GPS uses coordinates to guide us to our destination.
meanings.sent3: The spy used the coordinates to locate the secret base.
meanings.sent4: The treasure hunter followed the coordinates to find the buried chest.
meanings.sent5: The coordinates on the map led them to the ancient ruins.
